message: I'm feeling generous, but I want the majority of the money.  This is a good starting point for negotiation.
You're being greedy, I'll give you a fair share
Let's compromise. I'm willing to take a little less, but we both need to get something out of this deal.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want the majority
We're running out of time.  Let's split the money more evenly this time.  If we keep rejecting each other, we'll both get nothing.
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share
This is our last chance. Let's split the money equally and avoid losing everything.
